# Better yield on your ETH.
Better liquidity for your NFTs.

Our investors:

### The new best way to Earn

### Permissionless pools

Pair any token with any NFT

### Maximum yields

Pool funds alongside other depositors to maximize your yield

### Fully composable

Use your deposit tokens throughout the rest of DeFi

### Borrow against your digital assets

### Default protection

Never worry about missing a repayment again

### Instant, perpetual liquidity

One click borrow, one click refi

### No liquidations

Never get liquidated on your NFT

infrastructure for scaling liquidity.
